select ar.*, lc.number as car_num, GetUsernameByUserInfoId(co.user_info_id) as courier_name, get_name_by_id(co.type_id,co.logistic_id) as belong, st.name as step, sta.name as status, GetAddress(ar.step_id,ar.order_num,ar.to_id) as next_address from t_arrangement ar left join t_logistics_car lc on ar.car_id = lc.id left join t_logistics_courier co on co.id=ar.courier_id left join t_step st on st.id=ar.step_id left join t_status sta on sta.id=ar.status_id
where ar.order_num like concat('%',#{queryVO.query},'%') or lc.number like concat('%',#{queryVO.query},'%') or ar.create_time like concat('%',#{queryVO.query},'%')
